text: Glad you brought up another track from this game. I remember you loved the game, but as time passed it slipped my mind. Good little reminder I should play it myself.
author: boyblob

text: Reminds me of Secret of the Forest from Chrono Trigger. Both use suspended arpeggios as their main motif.

text: This track is so alluring, I feel like it put me in a trance-like state.
author: DASHMAN

text: yo im feeling high off this shit like what. never has a song ever
author: Ichiko

text: This is still my favorite pure Metroid-like. I never had a problem with its simplistic pixel graphics, but if you're a fan of Metroid and have not tried this game because of that, I absolutely recommend still giving it a shot. The world design, the gameplay and the music are top notch, and the post-game content ends up going in such a deep and dark place that I still think about it. This theme is quite haunting.
author: SupraDarky

text: i need to go back and do the post game stuff
author: Hatt Hanz

text: I'll definitely check it out, thanks.
author: Dr. Velious

text: I found out about this game through your Best VGMs, and it became my favorite pure Metroid-like as well. It's big, enchanting, challenging, satisfying. Such a good experience.
author: Jonochrome

text: I would love to play the post game content but I could never beat that damn instant death obstacle course you had to dash thru. I spent so much time on it to no avail.
